TopicTitle: Kerbopoly - My custom KSP Monopoly board (WIP)

Articles.Content:
This is the story of my custom KSP Monopoly board.

1: We drew it out on printer paper. CLICK

2: We made the money. I only made one of each because if I had made all of them, it would have taken HOURS. CLICK

3: We cut out a 22" by 22" piece of large poster paper and started to put on the properties. CLICK

4: At the end of Day 1 working on this, we are almost done! We still have to insert the rest of the prices and all of the middle stuff, but it is coming together nicely. CLICK

5: Day 2 was spent coloring, coloring, coloring! We finished the game board entirely. But there is still more to do. CLICK

NOTE: More updates will come as I do more with the project. Updates are in real-time.

Edited December 29, 2014 by MikeFox1

Me likey.

how much do one of these cost?
Oh my gosh yes! I take twenty!
Tree are really good great work I used to do somthing like that with spore it was good

Oooh. Looks nice.

Have to say I laughed when I saw the jail was re-named "GAME CRASH"
Thanks for everyone's comments, I'm glad you like it.
This is actually awesome. If you wanted, I could get to making some custom, game-like images for money, cards and/or properties for the game. Just PM me if you want some and what you want.

Dude, Talk to Squad, get permission to market this, and MARKET IT!!!

I think its safe to say half the people on this forum will take a set.
I could make a smaller, printable version that people can download.
Sorry that I didn't post an update yesterday. I didn't have much free time. I'm trying to set up my printer to print game pieces today.
I like how Dres is at the very front, and is the worst and cheapest property. may the eep space potato hid in its little corner of shame in the kerbol system.
Sorry there have been no updates lately, we were having lots and lots of parties. Will be back working on this soon!
